title: shrI subrahmaNyam
sahitya:
shrI subrahmaNyam samAshrayAmyaham 
satatam sarvam sahAdharam sahasra phaNam


anupallavi

  bhAsura maNIdharam kEshava talpam Ashamsita phala pradam AdishESam


caraNam    praNavanAda priyam praNuta caritam pApa haram dhIra shankarAbharaNam
prasiddha muraLIgAna madhupriyam kSIra priyam
